input: How many games did Wisconsin win in 2017?
sql_query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_wins FROM `llm-cfd.raw.game_data` WHERE (home-team='Wisconsin' AND home_points>away_points AND season=2017) OR (away_team='Wisconsin' AND home_points<away_points AND season=2017);
answer: Wisconsin won 13 games in the 2017 season.

answer.input: What was the average points per game scored by LSU in 2021?
answer.sql_query: SELECT AVG(total_points) AS average_points FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN home_team='LSU' THEN home_points WHEN away_team='LSU' THEN away_points ELSE NULL END) AS total_points FROM `llm-cfd.raw.game_data` WHERE (home_team='LSU' AND season=2021) OR (away_team='LSU' AND season=2021)) subquery;
answer.answer: LSU scored an average of 26.5 points per game in the 2021 season.

answer.input: What is the win-loss record between Ohio State and Michigan in the last ten years? Assume the current year is 2024.
answer.sql_query: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN winning_team = 'Michigan' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS michigan_wins, SUM(CASE WHEN winning_team = 'Ohio State' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ohio_state_wins FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN home_team = 'Michigan' AND home_points > away_points THEN 'Michigan' WHEN away_team = 'Michigan' AND away_points > home_points THEN 'Michigan' WHEN home_team = 'Ohio State' AND home_points > away_points THEN 'Ohio State' WHEN away_team = 'Ohio State' AND away_points > home_points THEN 'Ohio State' ELSE NULL END AS winning_team FROM `llm-cfd.raw.game_data` WHERE (home_team = 'Michigan' AND away_team = 'Ohio State' AND season>=2014) OR (home_team = 'Ohio State' AND away_team = 'Michigan' AND season>=2014)) subquery;
answer.answer: In the last ten years, since 2014, Michigan won 3 games against Ohio State and Ohio State won 6 games.
